In default , decode in io is open , You can use 
`<ddubbo:protocol  decode.in.io="false"> 
`in xml to close it (when you think deser takes long enough time).

we can switch serialization thread like this:
    <dubbo:protocol name="dubbo" port="20880">
        <dubbo:parameter key="decode.in.io" value="false"/>
    </dubbo:protocol>

there is no need to modify source code or add user define xml schema

This param control a client do `connect()` when send a request.
The default ExchangeClient is HeaderExchangeClient which doesn't need to connect when send request, so the default SEND_RECONNECT_KEY is `false` to match the HeaderExchangeClient.

If u choose LazyConnectExchangeClient, the constructor like:
`this.url = url.addParameter(Constants.SEND_RECONNECT_KEY, Boolean.TRUE.toString());`
The SEND_RECONNECT_KEY is always true because LazyConnectExchangeClient will init client and connect to server when send request.
